body:
Need a new computer for 1000 AUD. (Australian dollars) 

This certain PC may go for like 1200 idk.

Needs specifications that can run games like csgo, gmod and MC without lag, my PC now runs games with like 50 fps on csgo with low settings.

It would be better if I can pick it up instead of online shopping lol

My location is Sydney btw, if you know anyone selling in my area hmu.

Thanks, also I am not building it I have 0 experience.

title: Need a PC 1000 aud

replies.body:
https://www.umart.com.au/umart1/pro/index.phtml?bid=11
Umart sydney can hook you up with the cheapest goods

Building a computer is fairly easy, go search around on YouTube and make sure you're somewhat aware of how everything fits together.

From Umart you'll need:-
CPU
GPU (Graphics Card)
RAM (Memory)
Motherboard (Preferably ATX)
A case (with or without a powersupply & preferably ATX compatible) 
A powersupply (depending on if you got it with the case)
Storage (SSD and/or HDD)

Let me know if you need a hand with anything else

replies.body: Umart does yeah, but it'll cost a little extra. Have a go at making it yourself though! Its really simple and very rewarding playing on something you built ;)

replies.body:
"Btw I'm not building I have 0 experience"

I was 12 when I first built my computer. All you need is a decent video and your golden. 

Build it, and give me confirmation that  you are so I can get you a build. Honestly, it's so much more fun building a PC.
